owltools.ncbi
Class OWLConverter

java.lang.Object
  owltools.ncbi.OWLConverter
Direct Known Subclasses:
NCBIConverter
public class OWLConverter
extends Object

Provides common methods for converting data into Web Ontology Language (OWL) format using OWLAPI.

Author:
James A. Overton

Define the base IRI for Information Artifact Ontology (IAO) terms.

See Also:
code.google.com/p/information-artifact-ontology/, Constant Field Values

NCBI

protected static final String NCBI
Define the base IRI for NCBI Taxonomy terms. TODO: It would be better to put this in NCBIConverter, but this led to initialization problems.

See Also:

initializeFormat

protected static org.semanticweb.owlapi.io.RDFXMLOntologyFormat initializeFormat()
Initialize the format with standard default prefixes (rdf, rdfs, xsd, owl) and with the prefixes we will use (obo, oio, iao).

Returns:
The format with the prefixes set.

reformatName

protected static String reformatName(String name)
Reformat names for use in IRIs.

Parameters:
name - the string to reformat
Returns:
name with underscores in place of whitespace and hyphens

synonym

protected static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationAssertionAxiom synonym(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                                                                                  org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLEntity subject,
                                                                                  org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationValue type,
                                                                                  org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationProperty property,
                                                                                  org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationValue value)
Add an synonym annotation, plus an annotation on that annotation that specified the type of synonym. The second annotation has the property oio:hasSynonymType.

Parameters:
ontology - the current ontology
subject - the subject of the annotation
type - the IRI of the type of synonym
property - the IRI of the annotation property.
value - the literal value of the synonym
Returns:
the synonym annotation axiom

synonym

protected static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationAssertionAxiom synonym(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                                                                                  org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLEntity subject,
                                                                                  String typeCURIE,
                                                                                  String propertyCURIE,
                                                                                  String value)
Add an synonym annotation, plus an annotation on that annotation that specified the type of synonym. The second annotation has the property oio:hasSynonymType.

Parameters:
ontology - the current ontology
subject - the subject of the annotation
typeCURIE - a CURIE string for the type of synonym
propertyCURIE - a CURIE string for the property
value - the string value of the synonym
Returns:
the axiom
